#labels Featured

RFC 3320: Signaling Compression (SigComp)<br>

RFC 4464: Signaling Compression (SigComp) Users' Guide<br>
RFC 4465: Signaling Compression (SigComp) Torture Tests -_used for non-regression tests_<br>
RFC 4077: A Negative Acknowledgement Mechanism for Signaling Compression<br>
RFC 5049: Applying Signaling Compression (SigComp) to the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)<br>
RFC 5112: The Presence-Specific Static Dictionary for Signaling Compression (Sigcomp)<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1662.txt RFC 1662]: PPP in HDLC-like Framing<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc1951.txt RFC 1951]: DEFLATE Compressed Data Format Specification version<br>
[http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3174.txt RFC 3174]: US Secure Hash Algorithm 1 (SHA1)<br>
3GPP TR23.979 Annex C: Required SigComp performance<br>
